mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum as rn, A.* from ( select m_no, m_name, to_char(m_birth_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_birth_date, m_id, m_tel, to_char(m_year, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_year from sl_member
order by m_no ) A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

choose.when: where m_name like '%' || #{search} || '%' or m_birth_date like '%' || #{search} || '%' or m_id like '%' || #{search} || '%' or m_tel like '%' || #{search} || '%' or m_year like '%' || #{search} || '%'

mapper.select: select m_no, m_name, m_id, to_char(m_birth_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_birth_date, m_img, m_tel, m_email, m_zip_no, m_address, m_detail_address, m_img, to_char(m_year, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_year, le_name, m_loan from sl_member m, sl_level l where m.m_level = l.le_no and m_no=#{m_no}

select b_name, b_author, to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') l_lodate, to_char(l_retdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') l_retdate from lo_book l, sl_book b , sl_member m where l.l_bookid = b.b_id and l.l_memno = m.m_no and l_return_yn = 'N' and m_no = #{m_no} order by l_lodate

select (cnt_loan-count(l_memno)) l_y from sl_member m, sl_book b, lo_book l, sl_level v where l.l_bookid = b.b_id and l.l_memno = m.m_no and v.le_no=m.m_level and l_return_yn = 'N' and m_no=#{m_no} group by l_memno,cnt_loan
select count(*) l_o from lo_all_book l, sl_member m where l.m_id=m.m_id and l_over > 0 and l_return_yn='N' and m.m_no=#{m_no}

select (cnt_reserv-count(r_memno)) r_y from sl_member m, sl_book b, re_book r,sl_level v where r.r_bookid = b.b_id and r.r_memno = m.m_no and v.le_no=m.m_level and r.r_reservation >= 0 and m_no=#{m_no} group by r_memno,cnt_reserv
